snippet: MAIDMAN--Gail Ann Lowe. In loving memory of Gail Ann Lowe Maidman. Extraordinary wife to our father Richard, stepmother to us all, and grandmother to our children. Patrick, Arlene, Mitchel, Dagny, & Molly 1/3
lead_paragraph: MAIDMAN--Gail Ann Lowe. In loving memory of Gail Ann Lowe Maidman. Extraordinary wife to our father Richard, stepmother to us all, and grandmother to our children. Patrick, Arlene, Mitchel, Dagny, & Molly 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  MAIDMAN, GAIL ANN LOWE
